llm1_findings.title: Reentrancy via low-level call
llm1_findings.evidence: external call via .call{value:...} before state update (withdraw)
llm1_findings.rationale: State change after external call enables reentrancy
llm1_findings.recommendation: Move state update before external call or use ReentrancyGuard
